TITLE: Role-Playing
DEF: Students taking on different roles in a simulated scenario to explore a particular topic or situation
TASK: The Role-Playing pattern supports the experiential approach where students take on different roles in a simulated scenario. This pattern fosters empathy, communication skills, and understanding of diverse perspectives. Challenges may involve scenario design, role assignment, and post-exercise debriefing. To make this pattern work well, integrate AI for scenario generation and role assignment based on learners' capabilities.
